title: Implement the color-gamut media feature from MQ4
body: Implement the color-gamut media feature: it lets authors detect screens with broader than usual color gamut, like the newer macs and iphones.

comments.body: In addition to newer Macs and iPhones: newer PCs (like the Dell XPS I'm typing on) and newer Android phones (like the 2 year old Samsung S7 in my pocket). Just clarifying that the benefit is not solely for Apple devices, so Edge users would benefit too.
